<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.work_management_m" name="Field Service Management Mobile" version="1.0.0" help="CSHelp:Field-Service-Management-Activate-Field-Service-Management" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" onload_demo_data="load_demo_data.js" licensable="true">
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.service_management_m" /> <import plugin="com.snc.work_management" /> </requires>
<description>Adds the Field Service menu to the mobile user interface.</description>
<extension point="com.glide.ui.m.partial" name="dispatch_map_partial_m.xml" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.m.partial" name="dispatch_map_filter_partial_m.xml" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.m.partial" name="dispatch_map_filter_choice_partial_m.xml" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.m.app" name="scripts/app.m/DispatchMapCtrl.js" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.m.app" name="scripts/app.m/DispatchMapFilterChoiceCtrl.js" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.m.app" name="scripts/app.m/DispatchMapFilterCtrl.js" /> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Adds the Field Service menu to the mobile user interface.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Field-Service-Management-Activate-Field-Service-Management</help> <id>com.snc.work_management_m</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Field Service Management Mobile</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.work_management_m/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.service_management_m,com.snc.work_management</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.work_management_m</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
